title: Ginger's paradise
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Chinese, Indian, International, Italian, Japanese, Organic, Thai, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Mexican, Bolivian
description: Ginger's Paradise is an all organic farm that has opened its doors to travelers, not just for eating & sleeping, but also as a sort of permacultural & gastronomical school. It is possible to just eat but they suggest you stay there for a while too.
streetAddress: km 76 on the road towards samaipata
